In order for her to really be this level-headed, having a brother was something she couldn't do without.
...In other words... Satoko still needed a brother.
Nobody had the right to smile it away as childish immaturity.
In fact, they deserved praise for being so close to each other as siblings.
That role of brother should be played by her real Nii-nii, by Satoshi... but unfortunately, he wasn't here.
So since I'm here, I'll play the part.
And not with a guilty conscience—but in a very natural way.
Because...
Was there something wrong with seeing Satoko smile so happily...?

textJp: 「何ですの圭一さん。
さっきからずーっとにやにやしてますのね…！」
textEn: "What is it, Keiichi-san?
You've been smirking for quite a while now...!"

textJp: 「俺がうれしそうな顔をしてるとおかしいかな。」
textEn: "Is it weird for me to look happy?"

textJp: 「べ、別におかしくはありませんけど
textEn: "I-It isn't weird or anything, but......
well..."

textJp: 自転車のライトのモーター音が騒がしくて、沙都子が何を言ったかよく聞こえない。
textEn: The sound of the motor on her bike light was too loud and I couldn't hear what Satoko said.

textJp: 何？
何て言った？」
textEn: "Huh?
What?
What did you say?"

textJp: 「…いえ。
本当にどこまでも、にーにーに似てますのね。
圭一さん。」
textEn: "...Nothing.
You really are just like Nii-nii, you know.
Keiichi-san."
".........Is that right?"

textJp: 「…もちろん、本当のにーにーとは全然違うんですけども…。
……こう、……いろいろ。
…そういうところが似てますの。
…本当に不思議ですわね。」
textEn: "...Of course, you're completely different from my real Nii-nii...
...But, like... there's things.
...Things that you do the same.
...It's really a mystery."

textJp: 「……似ていると、…にーにーを思い出して寂しくなるか…？」
textEn: "...The same... Do you feel lonely when you remember Nii-nii...?"

textJp: 言ってしまってから、…とんでもない失言だったのではないかと思ったが、沙都子はまったく気にする風はなかった。
textEn: Once I said that... I thought for a moment that was absolutely the wrong thing to say, but Satoko didn't seem to mind one bit.

textJp: 「別に寂しくなんかありませんわ。
こうして、圭一さんがにーにーの代わりになってくれますしね！
textEn: "It's not that I'm lonely.
Since Keiichi-san is being my Nii-nii for me right now!

textJp: えっと、……その！」
textEn: Um... well, I...!"

textJp: いきなり図星を突かれ、うろたえるところへ、…沙都子は急に落ち着いた声で問いかけてきた。
…それはとても静かで落ち着いた、大人びた声だった。
textEn: As I was flustered for a moment at her hitting the mark... Satoko suddenly asked me a question in a calm voice.
...It was very quiet, composed, and adult question.

textJp: 「………梨花ですの？」
textEn: "...Was it Rika?"

textJp: 静かだけど、…どこかちょっぴり寂しい声だった。
textEn: It was quiet... but her voice sounded lonely somehow.

textJp: 「………梨花が、にーにーの代わりになってくれって、
圭一さんにお願いしたんじゃありませんの…？」
textEn: "...Didn't Rika ask you...
to act like my Nii-nii for me...?"

textJp: 「…そう思うのか？」
textEn: "...Is that what you think?"

textJp: 「……気を悪くしないで下さいませね。
…梨花って、…私には変に気を遣うんですの。
……私はそんなに気にしていないのに。」
textEn: "...Please don't take offense.
...Rika... is strangely considerate of me.
...But it really doesn't bother me that much."

textJp: …それだけはウソだと断言できた。
…昨日今日。
俺と一緒に、兄妹みたいに過した時間を、沙都子はあんなにも幸せそうに過した。
それこそが、気にしていないことをウソだと思える証拠だ。
だから、沙都子の頭をやさしく小突く。
textEn: ...I could say for sure that, at least, was a lie.
...Yesterday, and today...
Satoko had been so happy spending time like this with me as siblings.
And that was proof itself that she was lying about it not getting to her.
So I gave Satoko a light poke in the head.

textJp: 考えすぎだよ、ばか。
…俺は俺、前原圭一だ。
お前のにーにーの、北条悟史じゃない。」
textEn: You're thinking too much, dummy.
...I'm me—Keiichi Maebara.
I'm not your Nii-nii—not Satoshi Houjou."

textJp: 「……そんなのはわかってますわ。」
textEn: "...I know that."

textJp: そのくせ、…少し寂しそうな表情を見せる。
…この頃には、沙都子自身、自らの問いかけが失言であったことに気付いているようだった。
沙都子が後悔している話題なら、もうこれ以上、無理に続けなくていい。
だから話を強引に終わらせるために、沙都子の頭を鷲掴みにして、わしわしと撫でた。
textEn: Despite her saying that... her expression seemed a little lonesome.
...At this point, Satoko herself had realized that her question had been the wrong thing to say.
We didn't need to keep talking about something that Satoko regretted.
So in order to cut the conversation short, I grabbed Satoko's head and pet her.

textJp: 「そんな下らない話はもういいだろ。
もう遅いからとっとと帰って歯を磨いて寝ろ！
ついでだから寝る前にうがいもしとけ！
風の予防になっていいぞ。」
textEn: "Let's not talk about silly things like that.
It's getting late, so get back home, brush your teeth, and go to bed!
And rinse your mouth before sleeping, too!
It'll keep you from getting a cold."

textJp: 「そ、それを言ったらにーにーもですわよ！
ちゃんと歯を磨くんですのよ？！
うがいもしてお手洗いも済ませて、明日の教科書を準備して…それからそれから！！」
textEn: "Y-You're one to talk, Nii-nii!
Be sure to brush your teeth, okay?!
Rinse your mouth and wash your hands, then get your books ready tomorrow... And, and!!"

textJp: ………沙都子と悟史って、…どんな兄妹だったんだろうな。
…見たことはないけれど、…すごく仲が良かったに違いないと断言できる。
…どんな風に仲が良かったかと言うと…。
きっと、こんな感じ。
日中の暑さが嘘みたいに涼やかなのに、月明かりはどこかほんのりと温か。
虫たちの静かな合唱が、耳に心地よかった…。
textEn: ......I wondered what kind of siblings Satoko and Satoshi were.
...I've never seen them together... but I could say without a doubt that they were really close.
...As for the way in which they were close...
It was probably quite like this.
It was so cool that the day's heat seemed like a lie, and yet the moonlight was somehow faintly warm.
The quiet chorus of the insects was pleasing to the ears...
